title: Elihu: God Disciplines for Good
summary: Elihu continues to describe God as great and just. He teaches that God uses suffering to discipline and teach the righteous. Those who listen are restored, but the stubborn are destroyed.

faq.question: What is Godâ€™s purpose in allowing suffering, according to Elihu?
faq.answer: To instruct, refine, and restore those who will listen.

faq.question: What does Elihu urge Job to do?
faq.answer: To listen and learn from suffering instead of resisting it.
